Public MustInherit Class BaseDataEnvironment Implements DataSource, IDisposable
public ref class BaseDataEnvironment abstract : IDisposable, msdatasrc::DataSource
type BaseDataEnvironment = class interface DataSource interface IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
[<System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")>]

summary.span: 在已从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中模拟 Visual Basic 6.0 。

span.span: Emulates a Visual Basic 6.0 in applications that have been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，当你将中的数据库元素拖 `Data Environment` 到窗体上时，将自动创建数据绑定窗体。In Visual Basic 6.0, data-bound forms were automatically created when you dragged database elements from a `Data Environment` onto a form. `Data Environment`处理 Visual Basic 6.0 和 ADO 数据层之间的所有映射。The `Data Environment` handled all the mapping between Visual Basic 6.0 and the ADO data layer. 当应用程序升级到 Visual Basic 时， `BaseDataEnvironment` 将创建一个来启用 ADO 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyspecialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序升级到 Visual Basic 时， `BaseDataEnvironment` 将创建一个来启用 ADO 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familynewslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，也可以释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，释放参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在释放参数设置为的情况调用 `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当释放参数为时 `true` ，此方法将释放此控件引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
